definition.name: DropdownMenu
definition.purpose: Provides a root context for a dropdown menu UI component
definition.description: A wrapper component for the Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Root, used to create a dropdown menu context. It is the entry point for dropdown menu interactions and state management.

initial.data: Dropdown menu is closed and not rendered

when.description: User interacts with the trigger element (e.g., clicks or presses)

effects: Dropdown menu content is rendered and visible

when.description: User clicks outside the menu or selects an item

definition.visualLayout: No visual output itself; provides context for dropdown menu children.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Root and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuPortal
definition.purpose: Renders dropdown menu content in a React portal
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Portal, used to render dropdown menu content outside the DOM hierarchy of the parent component for proper positioning and stacking.

when.description: Dropdown menu is opened and content needs to be rendered in a portal

effects: Dropdown menu content is rendered in a portal

definition.visualLayout: No visual output itself; provides a portal context for dropdown menu content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Portal and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element for opening the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Trigger, used as the interactive element that opens the dropdown menu when activated.

initial.data: Trigger is rendered and menu is closed

when.description: User interacts with the trigger (e.g., click, keyboard)

definition.visualLayout: Renders a trigger element (e.g., button) for the dropdown menu.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Trigger and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Content, used to render the dropdown menu's content with custom styling and animation. Supports side offset and custom class names.

effects: Dropdown menu content is rendered and visible

definition.visualLayout: Renders a styled dropdown menu panel with animation and positioning.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Content inside a Portal and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: DropdownMenuGroup
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Group, used to group related dropdown menu items for accessibility and styling purposes.

effects: Group of menu items is rendered

definition.visualLayout: No visual output itself; groups child menu items.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Group and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuItem
definition.purpose: Represents an actionable item in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Item, used to render a selectable item in the dropdown menu. Supports 'inset' and 'variant' props for styling (e.g., destructive actions).

initial.data: Menu item is rendered and enabled

effects: Associated action is performed and menu may close

definition.visualLayout: Renders a styled menu item with optional destructive styling and inset padding.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Item and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: DropdownMenuCheckboxItem
definition.purpose: Represents a checkbox item in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.CheckboxItem, used to render a menu item with a checkbox indicator. Supports checked state and custom children.

initial.data: Checkbox item is rendered, checked or unchecked

effects: Checked state is updated and indicator is shown or hidden

definition.visualLayout: Renders a menu item with a checkbox indicator and custom content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.CheckboxItem and shows a CheckIcon when checked.

definition.name: DropdownMenuRadioGroup
definition.purpose: Groups radio items in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.RadioGroup, used to group related radio items for exclusive selection within the dropdown menu.
definition.visualLayout: Renders a group of radio items for exclusive selection.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.RadioGroup and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuRadioItem
definition.purpose: Represents a radio item in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.RadioItem, used to render a selectable radio item with an indicator. Supports custom children and class names.

initial.data: Radio item is rendered, selected or not

effects: Radio indicator is shown and selection is updated

definition.visualLayout: Renders a menu item with a radio indicator and custom content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.RadioItem and shows a CircleIcon when selected.

definition.name: DropdownMenuLabel
definition.purpose: Displays a label within the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Label, used to render a non-interactive label for grouping or describing menu items. Supports optional inset styling.

when.description: Label is rendered in the menu

effects: Label is visible in the menu

definition.visualLayout: Renders a styled label for menu sections or groups.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Label and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: DropdownMenuSeparator
definition.purpose: Visually separates groups of items in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Separator, used to render a horizontal line that separates groups of menu items.

when.description: Separator is rendered in the menu

effects: Separator is visible in the menu

definition.visualLayout: Renders a horizontal line as a separator between menu items.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Separator and applies custom class names using the cn utility.

definition.name: DropdownMenuShortcut
definition.purpose: Displays a keyboard shortcut hint in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A span element styled to show keyboard shortcut hints for menu items. Not interactive, purely visual.

when.description: Shortcut is rendered in the menu

effects: Shortcut is visible in the menu

definition.visualLayout: Renders a right-aligned text hint for keyboard shortcuts.
definition.implementationNotes: Renders a styled span for shortcut hints, using the cn utility for class names.

definition.name: DropdownMenuSub
definition.purpose: Provides a sub-menu context within the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Sub, used to create nested sub-menus within a dropdown menu.

when.description: User interacts with a sub-menu trigger

effects: Sub-menu content is rendered and visible

definition.visualLayout: No visual output itself; provides context for sub-menu children.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.Sub and passes all props through.

definition.name: DropdownMenuSubTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger for opening a sub-menu in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.SubTrigger, used as the interactive element that opens a sub-menu. Supports optional inset styling and displays a right arrow icon.

initial.data: Sub-menu trigger is rendered and sub-menu is closed

when.description: User interacts with the sub-menu trigger

definition.visualLayout: Renders a trigger element with a right arrow icon for sub-menus.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.SubTrigger, applies custom class names, and displays a ChevronRightIcon.

definition.name: DropdownMenuSubContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content of a sub-menu in the dropdown menu
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.SubContent, used to render the content of a nested sub-menu with custom styling and animation.

effects: Sub-menu content is rendered and visible

definition.visualLayout: Renders a styled sub-menu panel with animation and positioning.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DropdownMenuPrimitive.SubContent and applies custom class names using the cn utility.
